text: Verily, with hardship comes ease.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Be mindful of Allah, and Allah will protect you. Be mindful of Allah, and you will find Him in front of you.
The best of you are those who are best to their families.
The strong person is not the one who can wrestle someone else down. The strong person is the one who can control himself when he is angry.
He who is not grateful to the people is not grateful to Allah.
The Muslim who plants a tree or sows a field, from which man, birds and animals can eat, is committing an act of charity.
Speak good or remain silent.
The best form of charity is giving water to drink.
Do not lose hope, nor be sad.
And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah.
And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'
Verily, Allah loves those who put their trust in Him.
For indeed, with hardship will be ease. Indeed, with hardship will be ease.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
And He found you lost and guided you.
